message: Let's split it 60-40, a fair start to our negotiations!
I appreciate the offer, but I think we can do better.  I propose a 60/40 split in my favor, as a good starting point. Let's see if we can work towards a solution.
Not so fast, Bob! I'm not willing to give up 60% of the pot so easily. I'd like to counter with a 55/45 split in my favor.
I'm willing to give you a slightly larger share, but I still think 55/45 is a fair split. Let's see if we can meet in the middle!
